Review Date: 2018/06/18

Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.51 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01B6WTCCM_US', 'UPC': '784179131863 755332577347 676768409012'}
Review Text: Truly unreal this is really good no joke just as good as high end brands no lie. I was truly shocked but what can it hurt to try and see for yourself. This was a huge shock really good if you had blind folds on you would NOT know the differences between this and visesrts.
Review Title: Just because things are cheaper doesn't mean they are not as good or better then higher priced brands
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beauty Treats Eye Shadow MODERN MATTE 2 pc Palette
Review Date: 2018/06/18
Store: Beauty Treats
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Treats', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.51 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01B6WXOEY_US', 'UPC': '784179908755 755332499977 676768409036'}
Review Text: These truly SHOCKED ME.. These are just as good as high end that's no lie.  I have visearts and when I bought these I was truly shocked. They truly can stand with the high end brands and hold their own.  Honestly
Review Title: Just because something is cheaper doesn't mean its not good or better then higher brands.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Belen Thermal Temperature Color Changing Gel Nail Polish Soak Off UV LED Nail Lacquer 4219
Review Date: 2018/08/12
Store: Belen
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Belen', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces, 7 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '794168032521'}
Review Text: I love the way the colors change however I hate the way it makes your real nails even with a clear protector on 2 coats before hand it's still makes your real nails brittle soft and very unhealthy looking.
Review Title: I wish ida knew it was going to make my real nails brittle
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MILANI ~ Fierce Foil EYESHINE ~ 05 NAPLES
Review Date: 2021/07/23
Store: Milani
Product Description: ['Milani Fierce Foil Eyeshine Eyeshadow Quad 05 Naples']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Milani', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '4 Grams', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.54 x 2.68 x 0.63 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '717489690058'}
Review Text: These are the worse things I've ever put on my lids. My goodness talk about burning my eyes was on fire.  I washed them 5 times and still couldn't get this plaster off.  Please don't put these on your eyes.  I'm sending these horror rings back.  ASAP!!!!
Review Title: Tore my eyes up
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Maybelline Master Fixer Makeup Remover Pen
Review Date: 2022/02/15
Store: MAYBELLINE
Product Description: ['Master Fixer Makeup Remover Pen instantly repairs eyeliner, mascara, lip liner, and lipstick mishaps.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Color': 'White', 'Brand': 'MAYBELLINE', 'Product Benefits': "At home or on the go? Makeup slips can happen anywhere. Now, correct makeup mistakes instantly, all without ruining your look. Maybelline's makeup remover pen touches up any smudges or marks without leaving behind a greasy feeling.At home or on the go? Makeup slips can happen anywhere. Now, correct makeup mistakes instantly, all without ruining your look. Maybelline's makeup remover pen touches up any smudges or marks without leaving…   See more", 'Skin Type': 'All', 'UPC': '041554494563'}
Review Text: This is really a good little tool. Maybelline and so many places end up doing away with the OG'S which is awful and sad. Things like this are so good to have this works great holds up wonderful.
Review Title: Maybelline please don't ever stop making this.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong preference for affordable beauty products that deliver high-quality results, often equating them with high-end alternatives. Consistently high ratings are given to items that prove surprisingly effective despite their lower price point, signaling a bias toward budget-friendly options that challenge typical quality expectations. Products related to eye makeup, such as eyeshadows and gel polishes, dominate the purchases, showcasing a clear interest in eye cosmetics for diverse purposes, including bold and everyday looks.

Quality appears paramount, as evidenced by the significant disappointment expressed toward a specific product that caused irritation, while most other products received high satisfaction ratings. Price sensitivity is evident through the choice of affordable brands that still achieve impressive results, emphasizing their propensity to seek value without compromising on performance. Recurring remarks about product effectiveness and usability suggest the individual prioritizes ease of use and reliable functionality.

In conclusion, this shopper's core preferences center on high-value, budget-friendly beauty items, particularly for eye makeup, with a strong emphasis on product quality and performance over brand prestige. They demonstrate a willingness to experiment with various products, valuing positive outcomes and practicality in their beauty regimen.

target_interaction.title: Facial Oil it's ok
target_interaction.text: This isn't anything special they're getting out of hand with the prices. It's nothing at all that great. Just ok..
target_interaction.title_meta: Milani Prep + Soothe Camellia Face Oil (1 Fl. Oz.) Vegan, Cruelty-Free Moisturizing Facial Oil - Smoothes Complexion & Helps Prevent Dryness
features: SOOTHE & HYDRATE SKIN: Start your beauty regimen with our soothing Camellia Face Oil - a luxurious blend of Grapeseed, Camellia, Sunflower, and Sweet Almond Oils for a healthy glow.

FAST-ABSORBING MOISTURIZER: Weightless and fast-absorbing, this facial oil is packed with moisture boosting fatty acids and antioxidants to help prevent dryness and protect your skin from environmental pollutants.

VEGAN, CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: Formulated with Camellia Seed Oil, which is rich in Vitamins A, B, D & E, this camellia face oil helps brighten skin and reduce signs of aging, while prepping your skin for any makeup look. Formula is vegan & never tested on animals.

WE ARE MILANI: Born in East LA, we've always been connected to the rich diversity of our neighborhood, because it’s a place that truly embodies the melting pot of Los Angeles. We're not inspired by couture and top models. Our passion is real people, living real lives. Beauty is for everyone. No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.
